data.title: WebGPT: Improving the Factual Accuracy of Language Models through Web Browsing
data.description:
We've fine-tuned GPT-3 to more accurately answer open-ended questions using a
text-based web browser. Our prototype copies how humans research answers to
questions online—it submits search queries, follows links, and scrolls up and
